programme.title: The President's economic problems
programme.short_synopsis: Asian economic problems spread to Brazil; the limits of the president's economic power.
programme.medium_synopsis: The Asian economic crisis expands into Brazil and Alistair Cooke considers that though there's little a President can do about economic problems, they will always get the blame.

display_title.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
display_title.subtitle: The President's economic problems

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
